name: HSY--Personal Webpage
body:
Welcome to Hsiao-shan Yang's personal page!

I am currently a Postdoctoral Research Fellow in Business, Economics and Law of Genomic Biology Research Theme at the Institute for Genomic Biology at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I receive my Ph.D. in Economics at the University at Buffalo, The State University of New York. My doctoral dissertation focuses on studying the drivers of a firmâ€™s product portfolio management decision. As an Industrial Organization economist with the research interests in product diversification, technology competition, patent strategy, and academic entrepreneurship, I have a passion for analysis, and am enthusiastic about the opportunity to apply my quantitative analysis skills to the real-world problems. You can find [My Linkedin profile.](www.linkedin.com/pub/hsiao-shan-yang/35/24/915/) and contact information here. Please feel free to contact me if you have any suggestions or questions. Thanks!

E-mail: yanghs@illinois.edu
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
